ill give it a shot...maybe some sort of magical dagger needed. I ll check

Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Runed totem and skull


From: "Brad Fetkovich" <fetko1@...>

I ran across someone who had the skull of jen'tra (something like that)
yesterday.. she had a dagger in main melee weapon and the skull in the
second spot... that is what you do with it

> -----Original Message-----

> i just spent an entire day at Verant Int. it was a helluva lotta fun. I
met
> the guy who developed all the spells, went to lunch with smed, etc. I even
> had a chance to ask him about the runed totem and that skull. RUMOR. you
can
> do no such thing. his GM character has one and it's called the staff of
> discord and you probably get it if you kill the priest of discord. other
> than that, the runed totem staff is ONLY the runed totem staff and cannot
> into something else....
